009package Ch16_Color_Edges;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.RandomHueGenerator;
018import imagingbook.common.edges.CannyEdgeDetector;
019import imagingbook.common.edges.CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters;
020import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeTrace;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
024
025import java.util.List;
026
027import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
028import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
029import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
030
031/**
032 * <p>
033 * This ImageJ plugin implements the Canny edge detector for all types of images. See Sec. 16.3 of [1] for additional
034 * details.
035 * </p>
036 * <p>
037 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
038 * (2022).
039 * </p>
040 *
041 * @author WB
042 * @version 2022/12/12
043 * @see CannyEdgeDetector
044 */
045public class Color_Edges_Canny implements PlugInFilter {
046
047        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
048        private static boolean ShowEdgeMagnitude = false;
049        private static boolean ShowEdgeOrientation = false;
050        private static boolean ShowBinaryEdgeMap = true;
051        private static boolean ShowColoredEdgeTraces = true;
052        private static boolean ListEdgeTraces = false;
053        
054        private ImagePlus im = null;
055
056        /**
057         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
058         */
059        public Color_Edges_Canny() {
060                if (noCurrentImage()) {
061                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Balloons600);
062                }
063        }
064
065        @Override
066        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
067                this.im = im;
068                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
069        }
070
071        @Override
072        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
073                if (!runDialog()) {
074                        return;
075                }
076                
077                CannyEdgeDetector detector = new CannyEdgeDetector(ip, params);
078                
079                if (ShowEdgeMagnitude) {
080                        ImageProcessor eMag = detector.getEdgeMagnitude();
081                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Magnitude sigma=" + params.gSigma, eMag)).show();
082                }
083                
084                if (ShowEdgeOrientation) {
085                        ImageProcessor eOrt = detector.getEdgeOrientation();
086                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Orientation sigma=" + params.gSigma, eOrt)).show();
087                }
088                
089                if (ShowBinaryEdgeMap) {
090                        ImageProcessor eBin = detector.getEdgeBinary();
091                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Binary Edges sigma=" + params.gSigma, eBin)).show();
092                }
093
094                if (ShowColoredEdgeTraces) {
095                        List<EdgeTrace> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
096                        ColorProcessor traceIp = new ColorProcessor(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
097                        RandomHueGenerator rcg = new RandomHueGenerator();
098                        for (EdgeTrace trace : edgeTraces) {
099                                traceIp.setColor(rcg.next());
100                                for (Pnt2d p : trace) {
101                                        traceIp.drawPixel(p.getXint(), p.getYint());
102                                }
103                        }
104                        new ImagePlus("Canny Edges Traces sigma=" + params.gSigma, traceIp).show();
105                }
106                
107                if(ListEdgeTraces) {
108                        List<EdgeTrace> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
109                        IJ.log("number of edge traces: " + edgeTraces.size());
110                        int i = 0;
111                        for (EdgeTrace et : edgeTraces) {
112                                IJ.log(i + ". " + et.toString());
113                                i++;
114                        }
115                }
116        }
117
118        private boolean runDialog() {
119                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
120
121                addToDialog(params, gd);
122                gd.addMessage("Plugin parameters:");
123                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", ShowEdgeMagnitude);
124                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", ShowEdgeOrientation);
125                gd.addCheckbox("Show binary edge map", ShowBinaryEdgeMap);
126                gd.addCheckbox("Show colored edge traces", ShowColoredEdgeTraces);
127                gd.addCheckbox("List edge traces", ListEdgeTraces);
128
129                gd.showDialog();
130                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
131                        return false;
132                }       
133
134                getFromDialog(params, gd);
135                if (params.gSigma < 0.5f) params.gSigma = 0.5f;
136                if (params.gSigma > 20) params.gSigma = 20;
137                ShowEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
138                ShowEdgeOrientation = gd.getNextBoolean();
139                ShowBinaryEdgeMap = gd.getNextBoolean();
140                ShowColoredEdgeTraces = gd.getNextBoolean();
141                ListEdgeTraces = gd.getNextBoolean();
142                return true;
143        }
144        
145}
